actions.committee: Committee on Budget pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one committee reports the other committee have thirty days to report or be discharged
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Budget pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one committee reports the other committee have thirty days to report or be discharged.

actions.committee: Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one committee reports the other committee have thirty days to report or be discharged
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one committee reports the other committee have thirty days to report or be discharged.

official_title: A resolution calling on the President and the Congress to begin negotiations to fashion a new and flexible budget agreement.

summary.text: Declares that the President and the leadership of the Congress should begin negotiations at the earliest possible date to fashion a new budget agreement which is more flexible and allows moneys to be transferred from one discretionary budget category to another so that both the legislative and executive branches will be better able to respond to the needs of the people of the United States and peoples around the world.

titles.title: A resolution calling on the President and the Congress to begin negotiations to fashion a new and flexible budget agreement.
